TEXT.French: [NEWLINE]Appuyez sur <CTRL> pour visualiser les valeurs de base.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][BOLD]<STRG>[\BOLD] drücken, um die Basiswerte zu sehen
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE]Tieni premuto <CTRL> per visualizzare i valori base.

TEXT.English: The Total Commerce from Domestic Trade Routes
TEXT.French: Commerce Total provenant des Routes d'échange
TEXT.Italian: Commercio totale dalle rotte commerciali interne
TEXT.Spanish: Comercio total proveniente del comercio interno
TEXT.Finnish: The Total Commerce from Domestic Trade Routes

TEXT.English: The Total Commerce from Foreign Trade Routes
TEXT.French: Commerce Total provenant des Routes d'échange étrangères
TEXT.Italian: Commercio totale dalle rotte commerciali estere
TEXT.Spanish: Comercio total proveniente del comercio exterios
TEXT.Finnish: The Total Commerce from Foreign Trade Routes

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Will lose %d1[ICON_PRODUCTION] if not produced this turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Va perdre %d1[ICON_PRODUCTION] si non utilisé ce tour[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%d1[ICON_PRODUCTION] gehen verloren, falls nicht in dieser Runde produziert wird[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Perderà %d1[ICON_PRODUCTION] se non viene prodotto questo turno [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Perderá %d1[ICON_PRODUCTION] si no es producido este turno[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Will lose %d1[ICON_PRODUCTION] if not produced this turn[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%d1[ICON_PRODUCTION] gehen verloren, falls für %d2 [NUM2:Runde:Runden] nicht produziert wird[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_CYAN]Si dispone di un trattato di pace[COLOR_REVERT]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_BLUE]Si dispone di un patto di difesa[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_CYAN]Vous êtes une Cible de Guerre limitée[COLOR_REVERT]
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Vos réseaux commerciaux ne sont pas connectés
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Le vostre reti commerciali non sono collegate

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You have not signed an Open Borders agreement
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Vous n'avez pas signé d'accords de Libre Passage
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Non avete siglato un Accordo di Libero Scambio
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No has firmado un acuerdo de Apertura de Fronteras
TEXT.Finnish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You have not signed an Open Borders agreement

TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Vos doctrines n'autorisent pas le Commerce extérieur
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]La tua Forma di Governo non consente il Commercio Estero

TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Leurs doctrines n'autorisent pas le Commerce extérieur
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]La loro Forma di Governo non consente il Commercio Estero

TEXT.English: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]City cannot draft another unit this turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Ne peut recruter d'autre unité ce tour[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Die Stadt kann in dieser Runde keine weitere Einheit rekrutieren[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]City cannot draft another unit this turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]City cannot draft another unit this turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]City cannot draft another unit this turn[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.German: Ihr könnt in dieser Runde noch %d1 [NUM1:Einheit:Einheiten] rekrutieren

TEXT.English: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You cannot draft any more units this turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Vous ne pouvez pas recruter d'autre unités ce tour[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Ihr könnt in dieser Runde keine weitere Einheit rekrutieren[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You cannot draft any more units this turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You cannot draft any more units this turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You cannot draft any more units this turn[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.German: Bei Entfernung der Geländeart %s1_FeatName wird die Stadt %s3_CityName %d2_Num [ICON_PRODUCTION] erhalten.
TEXT.Italian: Sgombrando una casella di %s1_FeatName si è creerà %d2_Num [ICON_PRODUCTION] per %s3_CityName.

TEXT.English: [SPACE](<ALT> for All Units of the active unit's type)
TEXT.French: [SPACE](<ALT> pour toutes les Unités du même type)
TEXT.German: [SPACE](<ALT> für alle Einheiten des aktiven Einheitentyps)
TEXT.Italian: [SPACE](<ALT> per tutte le Unità del tipo dell'Unità attiva)
TEXT.Spanish: [SPACE](<ALT> para todas las unidades del mismo tipo que la unidad activa)
TEXT.Finnish: [SPACE](<ALT> for All Units of the active unit's type)

TEXT.English: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You have already chosen your free tech(s)[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Vous avez déjà choisi votre Technologie gratuite[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You have already chosen your free tech(s)[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: Les Gouverneurs des Villes produisent des Ouvriers
TEXT.Italian: I Governatori cittadini costruiscono i Lavoratori
TEXT.Spanish: Gobernadores de la Ciudad producen Trabajadores
